abstract.description: Dataset in reduced NanoAOD format for education and outreach derived from the primary dataset in AOD format linked below.

dataset_semantics.description: Run number
Luminosity block number
Event number
Flag indicating whether the event passed the respective trigger
Flag indicating whether the event passed the respective trigger
Flag indicating whether the event passed the respective trigger
Number of primary vertices
Number of muons in this event
Transverse momentum of the muons
Pseudorapidity of the muons
Azimuth angle of the muons
Mass of the muons
Charge of the muons (either 1 or -1)
Muon object identification with soft requirements
Muon object identification with tight requirements
Muon isolation divided by the transverse momentum in the $R=0.3$ cone
Muon isolation divided by the transverse momentum in the $R=0.4$ cone
Indices for the muons pointing to the related objects in the generator particle collection
Number of taus in this event
Transverse momentum of the taus
Pseudorapidity of the taus
Azimuth angle of the taus
Mass of the taus
Charge of the taus (either 0, 1 or -1). 0 indicates that the charge could not be determined.
Hadronic decay mode of the taus
Tau isolation divided by the transverse momentum
Indicates passed decay mode finding of the taus
Indicates passed tau discriminator with [very loose, loose, medium, tight] requirements
Indicates passed anti-electron discriminator with [loose, medium, tight] requirements
Indicates passed anti-muon discriminator with [loose, medium, tight] requirements
Indices for the taus pointing to the related objects in the generator particle collection
Number of jets in this event
Transverse momentum of the jets
Pseudorapidity of the jets
Azimuth angle of the jets
Mass of the jets
Jet pile-up identification flag
b-Jet identification score
Missing transverse energy
Azimuth angle of the missing transverse energy
Number of stored generator particles
Transverse momentum of the generator particles
Pseudorapidity of the generator particles
Azimuth angle of the generator particles
Mass of the generator particles
Particle identification number of the generator particles
